contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 2, 1975 D Watford (Youth Section)
LHCBBA Watford Contest (Youth Section) 50 Own Choice Test Piece Contest LHCBBA Watford Contest watford-youth-section
Youth
Watford Colosseum, Watford, Hertfordshire, England, UK Adjudicators: Programme has printed David Read: Open and Second Sections, Cyril Suckling: Third and Youth Sections. However, this is crossed out by hand, and substituted is David Read: Open, Third, and Youth Sections, Cyril Suckling: Second Section.
Aug. 17, 2012, 3:56 p.m. Nov. 29, 2020, 11 a.m.
1 Kennington (Oxford) Ron Sudworth Indian Summer
2 Ongar Comprehensive School Band A. Moore
3 Towcester Studio Youth I. J. Floyd
4 Wycombe Youth Llewellyn Teideman Three Songs without Words
5 L. C. S. (Waltham Forest) Youth Band Robert Walker
6 Portsmouth City Geoffrey Mason
6 Park High School Brian L. Harrison
